entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-01-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Workload feature band fallback doesn't work with workload update #23403
  • Workload feature band fallback doesn't work with rollback files #23402
  • [dotnet-sdk-7.0.100-alpha.1.22057.7]MaterialDesignInXamlToolkit failed to launch with BadImageFormat exception #23394
  • Package validation not working when PackageId is used #23393
  • Strange fallback RIDs #23390
  • MSBuild rebuild project when custom .target, .pros file modified #23388
  • Merge templating repo into SDK to simplify repo graph and merge runtime/system.commandline dependencies #23385
  • Automate the drop creation and insertion process for runtime and wasm workloads #23384
  • restore-toolset.* still referencing 6.0 RC2 #23383

Closed

  • With .NET 7 x86 SDK, Testhost process exited with error: It was not possible to find any compatible framework version #23362

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.2xx' => 'main' #23404
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [release/6.0.2xx] Backport Improve console output of `dotnet watch` ⌚ (#23318) #23400
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • I noticed that another test handled this better so cleaning up the test code. #23231
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.2xx' => 'main' #23347
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [release/6.0.2xx] Backport Catch dotnet watch task cancellation (#23316) #23386
    Area-AspNetCore
  • Improve console output of `dotnet watch` ⌚ #23318
    Area-AspNetCore

Updated

  • Fix typo in Strings.zh-Hans.xlf #22866
    Area-Infrastructure
  • userlocal detection: also force last digits to zero for non-preview versions. #23080
    Area-Workloads
  • Allow print rollback when non-admin. #23326
    Area-Workloads, 6.0.3xx
  • [release/6.0.1xx] Update man pages #23350
    Servicing-consider
  • Block loading the 7.0.100 SDK in 16.11 and below VS and MSBuild versions #23302
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Enable additional test projects to run on helix #23381
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Revert to same version of System.CommandLine as 6.0.1xx. #23380
    Area-Workloads
  • Update application insights version #22974
    Area-Infrastructure
